channel.title: Gosh... 1 error.. lol help pl0x
channel.description:
[code]client.java:10900: cannot find symbol symbol : variable other location: class client if(other.playerRights == 2){ ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
this error is seriously bugging me.. i tried to fix it.. and in my client.java there is other things that start with other.player and well this is the only one with a error...

client.java:107: cannot find symbol symbol : variable special location: class server server.special.specialAttacks(playerId); ^ client.java:108: cannot find symbol symbol : variable special location: class server server.special.specialAttacks2(playerId); ^ client.java:109: cannot find symbol symbol : variable special location: class server server.special.specialAttacks3(playerId); ^ client.java:110: cannot find symbol symbol : variable special location: class server server.special.specialAttacks4(playerId); ^ client.java:111: cannot find symbol symbol : variable special location: class server server.special.specialAttacks5(playerId); ^ client.java:112: cannot find symbol symbol : variable special location: class server server.special.specialAttacks6(playerId); ^ client.java:11133: cannot find symbol symbol : variable other location: class client if(other.playerRights == 2) { ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 7 errors Press any key to continue . . .

idc if i start something and then start adding more… if i cant get past 1 error then i will keep going til i get more.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2008, 06:16:43 pm[/size][hr]fixed the 6 errors… lol i had to add the public stuff to server.java but wouldnt i be able to add the trade 1 there too?

item.title: Gosh... 1 error.. lol help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Eh? other is declared inside the method, and void’s are methods… A method is not a variable. If you declared int a outside of a method, it would be global.
If you declare it like so:

public void one() {
    int a;
}

Then it is locally declared, not globally, like how other is… Just look in another source for what line other is.

Read full topic

item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Explisionist:

Shut the fuck up you dumb fuck… it was not aimed at you so go blow your mom… and you have no java coding experience at all… your experience is in leeching so go blow your mom you dumb fuck… and its globally defined not local… if your so damn smart you would know that.

Look, shut the fuck up and learn your facts before saying someone has no java knowledge. I know Bryan, and he may not be a perfect Java programmer, but he does know SOME Java. The variable other is NOT defined globally… It is defined locally in the trading method and uses the player that is trading them (their slot in the server) and uses that to find their object, and then uses that to call methods in that object or read it.

Explisionist:

bryan… your considered a dumb fuck… its globally defined… on every server if u put in a public void or a plubic boolean it will be global…

NO.
